website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-operate touch screen rearview mirror replacement with dual front and rear cameras. Allows you to record footage directly onto SD card.
pros: Includes camera in the rearview screen for forward-facing footage
Automatically activates rear camera when in reverse gear
Picture-in-picture mode allows both cameras to be viewed on screen
cons: Rear camera doesn't include any lighting or night mode

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! Didn’t have to tap into reverse lights, power comes from mirror which is dc powered. Amazing quality video from front camera, rear camera is good but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary chick

customer_reviews.title: The Pruveeo Company really stands behind their products!
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not format my Samsung 32 meg disk. I have tried 3 disks. NOTE:: May 2018, The Prueeo company HAS replaced my first unit (mirror) for not formatting my recording disk, NOW This is something I DID NOT EXPECT! I find that this company really stands behind their product and I will rate them the highest that I can! Ed Lee I really liked the first mirror but it just would not format the disk
customer_reviews.author: Edward G Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps freezing...!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mustang GT 07 convertible... can't hide the usb cable... (cheaper at Wal-Mart) ***update: after 2 weeks I've installed the screen keeps freezing and can't go to the main menu... keeps on saying stop recording plz. I've tried resetting so many times... works good for a bit then comes back... Annoying...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madafakar

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and a clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this dash cam into a Ford Expedition EL (extended length). My truck is a 2007, so it didn’t have a backup camera, and we wanted one. It clipped easily to the existing rear view mirror. The power wire just plugs into a 12v socket. I routed the rear camera wire around the passenger side under the edge of the headliner. It doesn’t show, and it reached with about 18” to spare. I made an aluminum bracket to mount the camera because it is designed to mount under something. If I had just screwed it to the top of the door it would have been upside down. Once installed it works great. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget for any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2nd gen dodge. I use the rear camera for backing up to my trailer and it works good for that. Rear camera video quality is pretty bad. Front camera video quality is great. For the price, it's an awesome tool. Records front and rear cameras simultaneously along with audio. If you have anything larger than a small car, you will need the extension cable for the rear camera. Also, if you have a large mirror, this will not cover the whole thing (this straps onto your original mirror). I had to swap a smaller mirror from another car into my truck. Overall, I'm really glad I bought this, it's a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Will recommend to friends!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good mirror Camera!!! I saw my brother’s, and I love it then I got myself one as well! Many people think it’s just a mirror when they look at it.. but actually it’s a mirror with a camera on it!! Quality of the day time video is very good, but night time video is just ok... Voice can be recorded as well!! If it can record the video longer (maximum it’s 3 mins per video) then it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Good Mid Priced Unit With All The Necessary Features
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars because it works well, is easy to operate, and has a pretty good picture. I’d like to see it record in QuickTime format instead of AVI since I’m on a Mac but it’s not that hard to convert. I also like Bluetooth so that I could transfer a file directly into my iPhone. Great product though and would recommend it. Menu makes immediate playback simple and quick; great to prove what happened at an accident for authorities. Works well at night too. You’ll need to purchase the microSD card that’s recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henri

customer_reviews.title: Great company and great technical support. Great Cam.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Works great and is better than I expected. Easy to install. I would like say that Pruveeo Technical Support was wonderful. I had some problems with my wiring and they came through with spare parts to get me taken care of. I got th camera installed and it wasnt hard after watching the forwarded video that they sent me the link to. My wire was alittle short but I would have never known that till i ran it. Seems the supplied cable was short by 3 feet on my Dodge Dakota. So You might want to order an extension cable just in case. Like I said, there techinal support was great. Fixed me right up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome large touch screen, easy to setup and use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome large touch screen, easy to setup and use! Highly recommend this as the first cam I bought (different brand but similar ) I had to return because it stopped recording after 1 month. It also was not touch screen and not user friendly like this one. The only complaint I have is how it was shipped, it was in a bigger box but had no bubble wrap or protection, I hoped it didn't get thrown around too much during shipping, but today is the first day of use and so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Castleberry Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied!!! Love the touch screen and the size of the screen. Love the fact that you can go in split screen mode and watch both camera footage at once. If Pruveeo can update the software or hardware limitations to 64GB or 128GB, that would be perfect. Although, the 32GB max memory card capacity doesn't bother me at all. So, still 5 stars for me. Again, love the picture quality setting on 1080P FHD and the audio quality. Love the wifi live streaming on your phone too. WOULD RECOMMEND! best dash cam in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel T.

customer_reviews.title: Need to Fix date every time you use the car.
customer_reviews.text: This has good camera and works well. Problem is that you will have to set the date every item you get in the car. Because date reset back to default when you turn of the car. So only solution I found was to disable date on dash cam. Wat a waste. Not going to buy it again. But feel satisfied. They need to fix the date. Like seriously who got a time to fix date whenever they get in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Jamy

customer_reviews.title: Works, but there's a few things not in the description.
customer_reviews.text: I have not wired the camera to the backup lights on my car, so I'm not sure if that changes the behavior. 1. When you start up the car, the camera will stay on for a full 2minutes, you cannot change this setting. (i'm not sure if is different if the backup lights are wired into the rear wire circuit) 2. There's a powerup and powerdown bell sound that can't be turned off. 3. It's kinda big and bulky, remember if you have a fancy auto-dimming rear-view mirror, you'll lose that ability when it's covered up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price just cant beat it
customer_reviews.text: For the price just cant beat it, quadratech has similar for $300, back cam resolution is not great but adequate. I bought a direct wire kit and installed on switched terminal. Boots up fast, reverse cam takes about 3-4 seconds to activate. Starts recording automatically, front and back, after boot. Yes, you can wire to always on terminal, but then your recordings are just of your garage door. Also worried about always on eventually draining battery. 2018 wrangler JK
customer_reviews.author: data

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, even better support
customer_reviews.text: This mirror fit great over my stock rear view mirror on my 2002 Toyota Tundra. I did have an issue with the power adapter, maybe because I always unplug it when I park. The power part that went into the plug crumbled after about six months of use. I contacted support via email to see about purchasing a replacement power adapter. Jimmy from the Pruveeo Team responded shortly after telling me he would ship me two of them for free! I just got them and they are the correct part. Great support, Thank you Jimmy.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy to use, dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't reviewed any footage yet, but it doesn't look great when replaying, or recording live, on the mirrors screen. I'm not sure how clear licence plates will be, but it's clear enough to see what's going on in front if your vehicle. The mounts are fairly sturdy, but it does vibrate a bit on bumpier roads. I haven't connected the rear cam yet, I'm hoping I can connect it in a way to constantly record along with the dash cam. The only thing I would change is the power on screen. It's very bright at night, lights the interior of my car. I wish I could turn that off or change it somehow.
customer_reviews.author: John Victor

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product at an even more amazing price. I LOVE it. I spent about 45 minutes getting my front and rear camera wires all tucked away behind the cars moldings. Can't see a wire anywhere. I mounted my rear camera inside the car. I have tinted windows and it's still pretty good. The front camera is insanely clear. The touch screen is perfect. The different view options is great. It looks great when the screen isn't on. I have mine set to turn off after 5 seconds. I love this thing and couldn't be more happy with it. And $60 is a RIDICULOUSLY low price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: BABYMETAL

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: They have a great service and really care about customers. They replaced me a new one with no charge when mine stopped working and return. it works great now!
customer_reviews.author: Thang Nguyen Dao

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best recording camera for my car that I have used. Since it straps on to the existing rearview mirror, it is not attached to the windshield by a suction device. I live in Texas and the heat in the summer just kills anything like that, melting and just generally not able to keep it on the windshield. It also comes with a rearview camera that is also helpful. Both cameras present clear pictures and videos, and the price is less than $75. I just put it on my 2018 Honda CRV EX and I am a 69 year old female. It was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a few days ago and received it just on Sunday morning. cannot wait and install it right in the afternoon. Everything seems worked perfectly well despite some negative reviews about backup camera. The mirror and screen is big and display both front and rear image in PIP. The photo quality is fairly good for rear view camera if you remove the protective film on the len. Rear view do show the guide lines which is just as wide as my Nissan Altima hybrid that makes back up far easier. I might need wait a couple of weeks to see whether it can hold it. So far it is good, much better than my previous two dash cams.
customer_reviews.author: xrye

customer_reviews.title: Warning: rear view camera is only 90 degree!
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2019-10-12 I am changing my rating from 3 start to 1, because its rear viewing angle is only 90 degrees, which I just realize after reading into the spec more. This is too narrow! I am in search for a replacement. My previous review: Easy to install, but the viewing angle is not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Beaver

customer_reviews.title: best one I've had so far...
customer_reviews.text: I have competitors model in my other car. this one has better mirror and interface is a bit nicer. this one has a 3-second screen off option when you start the car. the competitor 2 minutes. it's the little things that make this one nicer. the rubber bands to keep it mounted are kinda wimpy and I think they won't last too long. little worried about the heat, in the summer I will have to take this down and put it back up and the bands will most likley wear out.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Mixed.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is beautiful and functional, and the video is clear from both the front and rear cameras. The cable into the back of the rear-view camera was loose and the camera may not be waterproof. The camera is not wide angle - less than 90 degree field of view. Install the camera with the supplied cable or not at all. The factory supplied incorrect wiring diagrams for a custom install and destroyed (smoked) the first mirror/camera. Edit: the company reimbursed me for the camera. Changed from three to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative
customer_reviews.text: If your car didn't come with a back up cam, this is a really good alternative. It's super easy to set up. The only knock I have is during the daytime, the picture is hard to see due to reflection. At night, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: mckc

customer_reviews.title: BEST DASHCAM FOR YOUR REARVIEW MIRROR FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Best Dashcam for under $60.And 7 inch touchscreen makes it so easy to control.I am using this in conjunction with a 3D 360 birdview system to provide all time recording in my truck along with added recording security. There are a few nicer rear view dvr cams out there but you could spend close to $200 to add extra features you may not need. I will update with picture if possible.
customer_reviews.author: tim clark

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to with a great picture in front
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use on this mirror is great. I have not hooked up the backup camera yet but expect to hook it up as a continuous stream. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars out of 5 is that even though picture quality is bright an crisp during the nighttime, the mirror cannot me changed to the night vision version of regular mirrors. Therefore, rear headlights are very bright. Look for the go pro memory card specs and that kind of card will work without formatting.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Wabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: In some states a dash cam can get you a ticket for blocking the view through the windshield. They can't ticket you for having a rear view mirror. The display is not bright enough for sunny Florida days. I just turn the display off except when i'm aiming the camera. I mounted the rear camera inside the rear window of my SUV, just below the center brake light. It gives a great view down the road. But it's not very useful as a backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Albert H.

customer_reviews.title: Durability needs to be strengthened
customer_reviews.text: After each boot, the screen of the rear lens always has no image or beating image. Even after one minute, when the screen is off, there is no image of the rear lens. It is normal to check the line on the street because the image is the same as the power supply. Does the wire cause insufficient power? This is a responsible store!The store letter asks for the return of the repair,The problem we found was that the main power supply was not enough.n addition, the problem has been solved after purchasing and external power supply!So I will recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great item it works well in day and at night, the image is super clear and the touch screen is easy to use. It took me a bit to run the rear camera wire so it did not show but once installed the system worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is so worth the money! I bought for my truck that was difficult to see out the back window due to tinting. I placed backup camera just above the back plate. This makes hooking to see trailer a breeze & gives me a birds eye view for backing up & such at other times. We are investing in a second camera for our other car we love this one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Aernifamily

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: At first, I only used the front camera. I finally ran the cable for the rear camera about a month ago. I am not using the backup option, because I didn't want to wire it into my reverse lights. With the rear camera connected only to the main camera unit, it records rear views fine. Hopefully, it works well long term.
customer_reviews.author: Ron389

customer_reviews.title: 100% good product.
customer_reviews.text: I totally recommend this product . is easy to install and I works 100% good. I recommend to get the 128GB SD card it give you 8hrs. It comes with the cables front camera rear and camera, The touch screen works great. It does record front and back in the same time, 100% sure.
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: East set-up. Helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality in terms of details such as number plate are not clear for front camera with moving vehicles. Otherwise it's a good camera. Was so easy to set up. I didn't need a manual. Update. This saved me lots of stress dealing with opposing insurance when my vehicle was hit head-on. Didnt likebthat on impact the rear cam connector (jack) was dislodged, losing rear video.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for daytime
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for two cars in the household. The camera and the screen is good for daytime but it is blurry at night, I guess they are all like that anyways. Installation on the Nissan was way easier than Audi. The wires are excessively long for no reason though and it was really hard to hide them on my Audi. Overall it is a big touch screen and it works great, would suggest to perhaps enhance the wires to make it shorter?
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie Bun

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT automatically lock files when in an accident
customer_reviews.text: I got rear-ended tonight. When I got home and pulled the microSD card to retrieve the files for the accident, they'd been overwritten. This is a 16GB card, so it's not due to a lack of space. The camera did NOT lock the files and prevent them from being overwritten. So if that's important to you, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Beware this mirror is super heavy. On my Honda Civic, it was too heavy that it always dragged the mirror down. Sick of always trying to re adjust the mirror, I decided to take it off completely. Quality is fine for the price, but the loud Boise are really annoying. The screen takes about a minute to turn off, so driving at night could be very distracting. Backup camera lens line of sight isn't wide enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best add on for your auto at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: After 3rd attempt I finally got one that works. I am very happy with the performance and quality and easy to install although I paid someone to do it. The company stands behind their product and can't really go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Myphixer

customer_reviews.title: Failed very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The camera failed in less than 6 months, just keeps re-booting. The quality of the rear camera was quite poor too. Of course it is out of the return period so I am left with an overpriced mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Demo_Homer

customer_reviews.title: good to have.
customer_reviews.text: this works exceptionally well. I have one setup in a work car, that is on 24/7. It's bee months and keeps working. I have an older one that's over 5 years old, and it still works, but it's only used when I drive. the only thing that may wear out is the flash memory (only so many reads/writes permitted) but sofar, it's great. would highly recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: driftinge30

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about this camera because of the price, but this dash cam works great! I only bought to help assist in hooking up my boat trailer. The image and picture quality is great. I'm very impressed with it. I only wish it had two positions to set the camera. If I position it to hook up the trailer, I can't see farther then my trailer hitch. If I position it to see images when backing up, I can't see my trailer hitch anymore. So I plan to customize a two position braket to allow me to switch back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to install, great customer service (from both Amazon and Pruveeo ) and a really great functional product.
customer_reviews.text: As with the experience of another reviewer, the wire run to the back of my vehicle required a longer video cable. This need for extra length is unlikely in smaller vans or cars but my vehicle is a nissan nv3500 high roof van. Upon my request, Pruveo sent me an additional cable which I spliced together with the first cable. I compared the video quality before andd after the cable modification and I did not detect any signal loss or interference. This review is not yet based upon an extended period of use of the camera. The backup camera is getting permanently intalled tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: cornbro

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install I couldn't believe it. Not being a jack of all trades I was a little intimidated in hiding the wiring, running it from front to rear, etc. but with the right tools it was a breeze. Even the rear camera was simple to attach even though I did have to drill into the plastic. Very happy with the purchase and I take comfort in knowing I have the added layer of "proof" should there ever be an accident.
customer_reviews.author: DB Wald

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret, very satisfied with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this camera 100% to everyone. Front and rear views are definitely clear and nothing to worry, all angles are fine. Even my friends and family when they tried to drive my SUV, they were all amazed and very happy with the camera. I am very satisfied, and highly recommend this Pruveeo D700 7-Inch Touch Screen Backup Camera Dash Cam Front and Rear Dual Channel .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I originally received this product but the rear camera stopped working a couple days in. I reached out to the vendor and they sent me a new one right away. The second one has worked great. I'm happy and it works as advertised. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Petrey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture. Its bigger then the current mirror which I actually like. Mirror is a lit bit darker then the one that's on my truck. Overall very happy with this product. I put mine on a ram 1500 and needed to buy an extension for the back up cam
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. I have it set to the lowest resolution to save memory space. I had never actually bothered to look at any videos until I ended up right behind a very bad hit and run. Even on low res the camera clearly showed the vehicles license plate at about 10 feet. Night quality is very good. Also, the interface is intuitive. The unit is slightly larger than my actual rear view mirror but not so much that it makes any measurable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: i use it as a backup camera not dash cam but the camera is very sharp and clear even at night its high def installation was easy but i wish thair was in easier set up for ONLY back up camera as apposed to rigging it that way
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Large display with touch screen ,bought second one for my dad
customer_reviews.text: The good : Large wide screen display ,touch screen ,I can view video on screen without taking card off ,fit perfectly on the original mirror The bad : We took 1 month vacation ,came back and the clock did not save (Battery) Conclusion : It is the good unit with fair price ,already bought second one and install for my dad minivan .Definitely will recommend this camera and buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this camera in a Police Car. Videos are high quality day or night. Wide view angle allows you to see both sides of road. Easy to install. Have rear camera attached to cage to monitor someone placed in the back seat. Will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these in the last few months. Great front camera, backup could be better but is still good. I wish that the cable to the rear camera was a little longer (reason for 4 stars, not 5). I had to buy two extension cables for two of our cars to make it work at $11 each. BTW, it needs a 4-pin extension cable not the 5-pin that is listed as "frequently bought together" I use a 64GB micro SD card and it works great even when it says that it support up to 32GB.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera system for my work truck. Came in very fast and was packed very nice. Simple to install and use. I did have to contact the seller for a technical reason and they help me out asap.. I will recommend this to all my friends and would give 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I like how it fit right over the rear view mirror. Thought I could hard wire this to my reverse lights due to the cord not being long enough to reach my bumper (had to buy the extension) found out it is NOT able to be hardwired. Only flaw is when reversing, the camera is not true to what shows in the mirror. Not sure if this can be calibrated on my end. Overall a great cheap option to add
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davalle

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and works well in a Chevy Volt
customer_reviews.text: The PinP function is a nice twist. Good to know that both cameras are active all the time and can be programmed to keep track of any action. The display could be a little less transparent. It can be confusing to look through the display to the actual mirror.
customer_reviews.author: kendall orcutt

customer_reviews.title: works very good easy to install
customer_reviews.text: i wish the rear camera wire was little longer other then that it works just fine. i have had this in my truck for almost about a year now. someone got in my lane and side swiped my truck and said i merged into her lane but police were able to view and confirm the other drivers merged into my lane and its clear enough to read the license plates of the front vehicles. i would give 5 stars if the rear camera wire was couple feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen makes it easy to switch through stuff
customer_reviews.text: Touchscreen makes it easy to switch through stuff. The rear camera is a little grainy. But it is worth it if you just want to record stuff while driving. Also the volume is good, not great but at least I can hear stuff from the playback videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Decent front view cam. Poor rear view cam. Intuitive touch screen commands. Installation was easy but took about an hour. Rear cam wire was long enough for my full size, three rows SUV. All in all a good buy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Shopperson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: this item cover only the basics of a dash cam and a rear view camera, you will have to buy an SD card to record and save videos, this system does not have G sensor or motion sensor, battery life is also short. if all you need is video recordimg while driving you can't go wrong with this system and is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Tehozol

customer_reviews.title: Installed in 2002 Toyota Sienna
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Installed in a 2002 Toyota Sienna that fit without any modification. Plenty of rear camera cable to route via the trim area over right side doors and into the hatch connecting the backup sense lead in hatch door on right side.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror mount for the money. It supports dual camera (forward & rear)
customer_reviews.text: Forward picture/video is quite good. The rear picture/video is somewhat less impressive. Night quality of rear camera is heading at best. Plan to upgrade in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great system for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great backup and dash camera system. A little difficult to install. The backup camera mount is in my opinion upside-down and I had to modify it and flip the camera on the mount to get a right side up picture. Once installed thiuit works great and has a great angle of view. The dash cam is a nice bonus and but much better video quality than the rear cam unfortunately. Great easy touch interface and ultimately just works.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Good Cost/Price Ration Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product to have a front recording cam and back cam when spending less than 50 dollars. Additionally, the rear cam image will automatically show in the screen when shifting to R-gear. The only thing you need to do is connecting red wire to your 12-V reverse light. (Black light to the ground) Easy to install and convenient. Recommend ! But the rear cam at night is not super clear. But it just only 50 dollars. So not a problem to me.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: What time is the camera flick it was back-and-forth from the front camera to buy camera by it self but otherwise it’s great perfect for reverse and it’s a great price
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo viegas

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality and features, value priced
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good value for the money. The system is fairly simple and the video quality is good for a low price. I installed this in my pickup using the 6.5' extension cord. I ran into a couple of challenges while permanently wiring the system, but found that the support team was helpful in working hard to make it right. I ended up with a defective hardwire install kit, but they refunded it with no hassles at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Only last 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great night vision is good, however only good for 18 months now start power cycling when turn on even after reset won't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: pretty good videos
customer_reviews.text: the rear camera have led which help to record in night with almost not effort. the front camera obviously use vehicle light to help recording, getting very good quality videos
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Front and back camera views when driving.
customer_reviews.text: Used this camera for recording driving habits. Menu on mirror is easy to use, but had to spend time in routing the electrical cables for this device. Good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Neat product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Neat product for the price and great customer service I would buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: It was relatively easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For 60.00 this back up camera works very well. It was relatively easy to install. The picture is very easy to see and it really helps when backing up..It doesn't have quite the quality of a more expensive camera, but if your on a budget, this one works great..
customer_reviews.author: Donald Corkum

customer_reviews.title: It does not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Make the installation of the Pruveeo D700 in a Toyota Prado 2016. From the beginning I had problems for the flashback camera. It was not always activated with the reverse (although the installation was correct). On some occasions the camera shuts down, and I have to disconnect and reconnect the switch. I hoped it was a good purchase. But it did not meet my expectations. I lost my money.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good unit. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After contacting customer service i have increased my rating to 4 stars. Battery is working as designed. Pretty straightforward to operate. My problem is the battery life. The battery icon always shows "charging" when it's plugged in, but as soon as power is disconnected it shuts off. Per Pruveeo the battery is only for emergency file saving, not camera operation while the unit is disconnected from power.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No way to control screen brightness
customer_reviews.text: I liked a lot about the camera. Items that need addressing are: Reflective properties of mirror is too poor for safe use, no dimming backlight control makes the mirror way to bright at night, Second rear camera is very low quality lower than 480P and does not actually have night vision. The ir led on the camera is fake . I know that’s harsh but it’s true. I did like most everything else about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: my dad loves this camera. the quality is very nice.....but the professional installation cost more then the camera itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tequi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... a looking around for the right one this looks pretty good with the options and I like it that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to install one of these in my car for the longest time I was just kind a looking around for the right one this looks pretty good with the options and I like it that it’s easy to install I just wanna have the capabilities I had of my newer car same as my older car it’s nice to have just as an extra addition to an older car.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: still haven't gotten the full effect of it but so far am liking it clear display looks great
customer_reviews.author: Nikko Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Clear and wide angles helps when  reversing
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny I needed this added feature for my son’s 2011 car Good picture quality I love the easy to use touch screen and you can access dual pictures front and back if needed at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Trini10

customer_reviews.title: Have to keep mirror plug in to charge so itll work. Battery last a couple min only
customer_reviews.text: Works great. for the price is worth it because It does what it suppose to. Only rated 4 star because u have the keep the charger plug in. The mirror will die quickly within a couple mins only even tho it said its fully charge unless I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: avong

customer_reviews.title: Backup image not the best in bright light conditions.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of features for the money. The back up image display could be brighter. Works best in lower light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer support
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dash camera, great deal for the price, the picture quality is fantastic, and the touch screen is very responsive. I had bought one about a year in the past, and then another one recently, I noticed the newer ones had a feature I liked, so I emailed customer support in hopes of updating it, but it turns out it couldn't be updated, so they sent me out another free of charge. Absolutly great customers support, and I really liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Baez

customer_reviews.title: For the price OK system
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install but had to purchase an extension cable to reach the back of the car. Front camera picture is fantastic, sharp and clear, but the rear camera leaves a lot to be desired, works OK but fuzzy and grainy. Overall not a bad system for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: foggy mirror when bright lights from the rear especially during the night
customer_reviews.text: overall i like this item, except when using it as a rear view mirror especially at night or reflection of bright lights.it seems foggy and not so sharp comparing to my old rear view mirror dashcam.i wish the mirror was more clearer and sharper or i might have received a faulty item?
customer_reviews.author: sol

customer_reviews.title: Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera I bought one for my truck and car and got one for my Mom. It works really great and have had no problems with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Rear camera to blurry .the seller is sending me a new backup camera . we believe I had a defective one. The front dash cam is excellent works great easy to use. I would definitely buy this product if I was you.
customer_reviews.author: twiche23

customer_reviews.title: rear camera mount doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: its a good product for the price the issues are the following 1. the rear camera comes with sticky tape to mount. it falls off in a couple of days. 2. there is no way you can turn off the hideous bootup sound.
customer_reviews.author: thangaselvam

customer_reviews.title: No android
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, it is not Android but it has the function of recording and seeing when I give reverse, in addition it records video from back and front ... If I have a suggestion for others the resolution of the rear camera will depend on the type of camera
customer_reviews.author: Zagato

customer_reviews.title: Rear camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says its best seller so I bought one.But it did not perform well.The front camera resolution is ok but the rear camera picture was distorted.Vehicles behind me looks so wide and distorted,can’t even see license plate behind me.I chatted online with customer service and ask what can they recommend to replace the back camera.The guy says just go amazon website.I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Good screen, the rear camera resolution is ok,but the image is out of ratio in full 7 inch view. It's good for seeing objects behind my massive truck and that's what I need. Camera sometimes distorts or fails when humid and raining. Update: Working great!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Lyall

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for hubby. I read many reviews on my camera systems before choosing this, and it was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: betty booper

customer_reviews.title: Great car camera
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two and one had a broken rear camrea. Called them up and got on in the mail in a week. Awesome product and service after the sale. Only con i wish the front camera had more movement. But satisfied Reguardless.
customer_reviews.author: David Graham

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a year then it stopped
customer_reviews.text: The front camera is much better than the back up camera. The backup camera is a bit fuzzy but the front one is crystal clear. Ive had this product installed on my car a little over a year and it rained for like three days in a row and the back up camera is filled with water. I mean I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: My new truck came equipped with a Factory Installed Backup Camera, so I mounted and am using this rear camera to view and record all my rear traffic occurrences. Everything works fine and the Customer Service is great. In my opinion, we should always use a Dash Cam Mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Unger

customer_reviews.title: You can have rear view at all times!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the rear camera is not hd,it has good quality video. The item is not cheaply made and it has a real big screen! The read cable is to activate the camera when you reverse, Its not for power!however you can have full time back vew at all time with or without the read cable connected.
customer_reviews.author: John Tsolakakis

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Front camera is great. The cord for the rear camera is too short, cannot go all the way to the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: kuro0430

customer_reviews.title: Clear screen for recording!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband just because he has a fascination with this kind o fly gadgets. It was easy for him to install and recently it recorded a crash that involved a stolen vehicle! The quality of the picture is impressive and more importantly the price! I feel like Uber drivers would love this as well!
customer_reviews.author: desirae

customer_reviews.title: Prices dashcam and backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as she does home delivery service. Comes in handy for backing up and not so good drivers.
customer_reviews.author: God's bass servant

customer_reviews.title: Works goos
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for grandparent. Easy to install and works good. Charging cord was broken and company sent two brand new cords
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: We will see
customer_reviews.text: Will do more of a review once my husband decides to the install! But all looks as it should from the description.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Best dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Has been working over 4 months 24/7 and no problems. Love the large screen. Just wish it had polarized filter for people who have super bright light but a easy fix with a tablet screen protector. Don't buy the dash cams advertised on Facebook most are scams.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Rear camera is a little fuzzy but the forward camera is great. The front camera is amazing in the rain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now and not a single issue with it. Rear camera is a little fuzzy but the forward camera is great. The front camera is amazing in the rain and at night. I would buy this again if this one fails for some reason. Very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE Dash cam
customer_reviews.text: This product is very user friendly. The company is very quick to reply for any need and concern you have. Must have dash, even though I use only the mirror and not the back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Don’t rate often

customer_reviews.title: Good .
customer_reviews.text: Quality is pretty good , The only issue is the timer ( 3 minutes ) and it goes into sleep mode unless yo tap on it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for couple of weeks, great video & audio quality, night video is clear too! Their customer service is awesome as well! Attaching a video clip from the camera
customer_reviews.author: knight_darkness

product_meta.title: Pruveeo D700 7-Inch Touch Screen Backup Camera Dash Cam Front and Rear Dual Channel with Rear View Reversing Camera
feature_bullets: 7" TOUCH SCREEN FOR EASE OF USE: Excellent 1080P resolution front camera with 150-degree wide angle lens + weatherproof rear cam.
AUTO DISPLAYING PARKING IMAGE: To help you park safely, D700 will automatically show the parking image in full view without pressing any button when the R gear is engaged.
DUAL-LENS REARVIEW MIRROR DASH CAM: Pruveeo D700 dash cam has two cameras and 7-inch rear view mirror.

PICTURE-IN-PICTURE DISPLAY: The large mirror display screen can display a single image with footage from one camera, or picture-in-picture display from both camera as recorded simultaneously. One-touch switch design, you can switch the view mode quickly from either full-screen display of front /rear view or picture-in-picture display.
EASY INSTALLATION AND OPERATION: Simply fits over your existing rear view mirror and install the cable inside the cabin of the car and plug into the cigarette lighter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,032 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
